description:
{RHelp Topic{W: Tharian{x

Tharian is the God of Balance. He believes that all things must stay in
balance with each other, which is a simplisic concept, but not so simple to
uphold. Tharian and his followers are an enigma at best, they might help you
one moment than turn on you the next all depending on what they think needs
to be balanced. Tharian is known to ally himself with and against all the
other deities, which doesn't make him any friends amoung his peers. They all
put up with him though because they know that if he is helping them, than it
means that they need the help even if they don't know it at the time.
Tharian's followers are known to be on both sides of most conflicts and even
though they might be fighting on opposite sides of a battle they will never
fight each other. Tharian does not like or dislike any of the deities, and
most of them don't seem to care one way or the other about him. Tharian's
followers don't really specialize in any sphere of magic, but take a little
bit from all.
